author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
When Adam set up his pantograph mill, there was one tool to adjust it's cutter collet that didn't make it to his shop. Today's build is cutting and brazing a custom hand tool to make that adjustment--without which the pantograph because more of a chore to use. How many attempts do you think it will take for Adam to successfully make this tool? 

Adam's pantograph mill: https://youtu.be/pku2VRADLGk

Shot by Adam Savage and edited by Josh Self
Music by Jinglepunks
